install.name: ajaxsearch
install.author: Jan Sangill
install.description: This module will display a ajax search box

param.name: text
param.label: Search box text
param.description: text displayed inside the search box

param.name: text_bottom
param.default: Nothing found? Go to the searchpage.
param.label: Bottom text

param.name: no_results
param.default: No results found. Try another query.
param.label: No results text
param.description: text displayed when no results found

param.name: category
param.label: Category
param.description: Select whether the category headlines should be present

param.name: order_by
param.label: Order by
param.description: Select how the results should be ordered
